posts.post_content:
Up for sale are the following T206’s – Don't be shy about making offers!!

T206 Jimmy Sheckard No Glove Showing - Partial Double Name - Piedmont 350 w/back damage/excess paper due to album removal. Could probably be soaked to remove most of the excess paper - $25

T206 George Davis HOF PSA 1 SC 150 Fact 25 - $35


Prices include shipping. Paypal gift preferred, but checks and money orders accepted as well. Please PM if interested. 

"I'll take it" trumps any ongoing negotiations.

Thanks for checking in, Steve
Bump. All offers will be entertained! Thanks, Steve
Bump for price reductions on the remaining three cards!
Updated to remove sold cards and pictures. Thanks for looking!!
Bump for "get 'em sold" pricing. I really don't want to use ebay guys!! :D
Final Price bump. They hit ebay at 8 PM EST tonight. Thanks for stopping by!
